sentences.english: Code coverage is a metric that reminds me of keeping track of your bad beats.
sentences.chinese: 代码覆盖率让我想起了记录狗屎运。

sentences.english: This report is an extension of the low coverage report.
sentences.chinese: 该报告是对低覆盖率报告的一个扩展。

sentences.english: To improve the fault coverage, storage-mode is added to LFSR-mode.
sentences.chinese: 用随机测试模式加存储测试模式，来提高故障覆盖率。

sentences.english: Data on coverage of some health interventions are more hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 关于一些卫生干预覆盖率的数据比较有希望。

sentences.english: Achieving adequate kernel coverage is another responsibility of a system stress test.
sentences.chinese: 获得足够的内核覆盖率是系统压力测试的另一个职责。

sentences.english: With 50% forest coverage, the island is green through all four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 岛上四季常绿，森林覆盖率超过50%。

sentences.english: Advanced software will help you predict the fault coverage for the test at hand.
sentences.chinese: 高级的软件能帮助你预测手边的测试的故障覆盖率。

sentences.english: That enables you to track coverage by schedule, as well as by environment.
sentences.chinese: 它可以让您根据日程表或者环境来追踪覆盖率。

sentences.english: One metric that comes to mind here is the code-coverage percentage of the unit tests.
sentences.chinese: 在这儿脑子里形成的度量是单元测试的编码覆盖率。

sentences.english: Does the incoming have good test and inspection coverage?
sentences.chinese: 对来料的检验覆盖率是否高？

sentences.english: Coverage analysis is more efficient when you use it with automation.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖率分析在您使用自动化时更有效率。

sentences.english: However, there is still a need to increase coverage to remote areas and migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仍有必要提高边远地区和流动人口的覆盖率。

sentences.english: In Zhejiang province, Mountain area is large, the forest coverage rate is high, non-wood resources are rich.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省山地面积大，森林覆盖率高，非木质资源丰富。

sentences.english: Coverage for effective PMTCT regimen is relatively high at 74%.
sentences.chinese: 有效预防母婴传播治疗方案的覆盖率较高，为74%。

sentences.english: Mobile cellular coverage of population in percent.
sentences.chinese: 移动蜂窝电话人口覆盖率。

definition: percentage of children who enter school
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
urbanization level (of a city or town)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
